title: [Self-directed] Instructional Design Strategy Workshop for Mathematical Fluency Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Instructional Methods and Understanding of the Cover-Copy-Compare Technique
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity to develop mathematics fluency training strategies integrated with science curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the differences between distributed practice and massed practice and select appropriate strategies based on the situation.
Learners can design a math fluency training program by applying the OTR (Opportunities to Respond) concept
Learners can develop and implement a 10-minute sample practice session using the Cover-Copy-Compare technique
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
